summaries.all: Multi-system view: backend APIs, analytics pipelines, admin tooling, and compliance controls aligned to internal SLAs and regulatory audit expectations.
summaries.backend: Backend view: CRUD APIs, versioned endpoints, background jobs, retry logic, and structured logging for operational visibility.

summaries.security: Security view: input validation, authorization checks, secure logging, and data masking.
